creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mrs Irma Levin in memory of Dr Ben Shenson
description: portion of crooked, gnarled plum branch at bottom thin vertical branches and delicate white blossoms; narrow, angled branch at L with dense blossoms and long, vertical branch shooting upward toward top center
marks:

title: Plum Blossoms
